name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Accomplished Consultant with 13+ years of experience specializing in **Solidity**, **EVM**, and **Smart Contracts** development, alongside cloud expertise in **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**. Proven ability to design and deploy decentralized systems integrating **Cryptography** and **Tokenomics**, ensuring robust and secure applications within the **DeFi** space. Skilled in leveraging tools such as **MythX**, **Slither**, **Hardhat**, **Foundry**, **Truffle**, **Remix**, and **The Graph** for enhanced project delivery and compliance.

Additionally, I bring a strong foundation in full stack development with proficiency in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Hands-on experience with frameworks and libraries including **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Champion of cloud-native system deployment and automation, I have effectively created AI/ML-driven platforms utilizing predictive analytics and CI/CD pipelines. Committed to aligning solutions with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, while enhancing client interactions through hands-on engagement and a strong sense of autonomy.
